mapper.insert: insert into content (CONTENT_ID, BODY, CREATED_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, USER_EMAIL) values (CONTENT_SEQ.nextval, #{body}, sysdate, 4, #{userEmail})
insert into hospital_qna (HOSPITAL_QNA_ID, HOSPITAL_ID, CONTENT_ID, QNA_TYPE, C_GROUP) values (HOSPITAL_QNA_SEQ.nextval, #{hospitalId}, CONTENT_SEQ.currval, #{qnaType}, CONTENT_SEQ.currval)
mapper.select: select a.content_id, body, created_date, user_email, hospital_qna_id, hospital_id, qna_type, c_group from content a, hospital_qna b where a.content_id = b.content_id and hospital_id = #{hospitalId} order by c_group desc, content_id asc
